title: Powers and duties
context: [PART IA.] MOTOR VEHICLE REGULATION [ยง286-16] Powers and duties. The director of transportation shall prescribe uniform standards and procedures for motor vehicle inspection, driver licensing, and registration, including the form and content of records to be maintained for the registration of vehicles and for the licensing of drivers. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 20, pt of ยง8]
